__e: He was talking big long enough.
If you're thinking about what to get old Dad for Christmas, don't worry about it.
We are committed to taking care of all the details so our clients only worry about what matters to them: the growth of their business.
Don't worry, I'm not going to make a speech.
I'm not going to make a speech but tell you the reason for this party.
─ Don't worry, sport, it's not your boat.
Well, go ahead, don't worry about me.
If I don't suspect. You've been a big help... and I don't want either of you to worry about me.
